title: Covid: Travellers returning to England warned of six-hour airport queues
content:
1. Covid: Travellers returning to England warned of six-hour airport queues  BBC News
  2. Britain plans to scrap quarantine for non-UK vaccinated arrivals in weeks  Reuters
  3. Plan to allow vaccinated people from abroad into UK to be revealed in 'next couple of weeks'  Sky News
  4. Covid-19: Amber list quarantine for fully vaccinated to end on 19 July  BBC News
  5. Travel stocks fly higher as UK government scraps quarantine for fully vaccinated  Yahoo Finance
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Covid: Travellers returning to England warned of six-hour airport queues  BBC News
Britain plans to scrap quarantine for non-UK vaccinated arrivals in weeks  Reuters
Plan to allow vaccinated people from abroad into UK to be revealed in 'next couple of weeks'  Sky News
Covid-19: Amber list quarantine for fully vaccinated to end on 19 July  BBC News
Travel stocks fly higher as UK government scraps quarantine for fully vaccinated  Yahoo Finance
View Full Coverage on Google News
